job description:
Savi Technology is hiring experienced data scientists excited to put their skills to work on the Internet of Things. At Savi, data scientists can create end-to-end solutions using sensor, open, and enterprise data. We are agile and fast-paced, and we use the latest Big Data and machine learning technologies, from Python/Scikit-Learn to Spark.

The ideal candidate should love working on data parsing, analyzing, investigating, interpreting, modeling, and extracting knowledge from large volumes of data. With a specific core focus on big data analytics technology, you will have the exciting opportunity to influence the companys data strategy. This individual will work with highly energetic cross-functional teams including product management, engineering, and marketing to help optimize the companys solutions.
Responsibilities:
  • Analyze data to identify trends, correlations, and anomalies using statistical and machine learning techniques
  • Build models that help our customers identify risk or improve performance
  • Prepare visualizations of processed data, identifying trends or anomalies
  • Investigate new data sources and identify data problems, data quality issues, and potential value
  • Contribute to the development of new ideas and concepts; translate these ideas into executable action plans
  • Work within cross-functional teams to engage the client, comprehend the client's concerns, develop strategic analytical products, and support requirements analysis, including process and systems analyses
  • Drive efforts to optimize company offerings
  • Develop and automate necessary reports and analysis
  • Research new data sources and analytical tools; contribute to new product development and operational delivery
Job Qualifications and Professional Skills:
  • Masters or PhD in Statistics, Computer Science, or related field
  • 5+ years experience in data analysis and data management
  • Extensive experience using machine learning algorithms
  • Demonstrated results orientation and follow-through
  • Strong programming, graphing, and database skills; preferably programming experience with Python
  • Skilled in acquiring and transforming data: SQL, scripts, and ETL
  • Experience with databases and large distributed systems
  • Skilled at data visualization
  • Track record of using math/stats background to solve challenging problems
  • Demonstrated experience in bridging business analysis and technical development
  • Strong oral and written presentation skills
